channel.title: Problem with IRC
channel.description:
okay, as many of you know the servero r something was wrong and you (Me atleast..) was redirected to the channel #badbotjoe or something. Well I pm'ed him and was banned from irc.moparisthebest.com now I try to connect and it doesnt say im banned, but I get this error
* IdentD listening on port 113 - (12:28:03) * Connecting to irc.moparisthebest.com (6667)... - (12:28:04) * Unable to connect to server (Connection refused) - (12:28:04) * Disconnected -
Please help me out.

item.title: Problem with IRC
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

yea, while the server was down i was banned, [retard]who is the owner of irc.moparisthebest.com[/retard]? Can mopar unban us, or clean all ban history?

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with IRC
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

for some reason you have been banned from the server, others have also had this problem
